TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 提供 中的文字方塊，可讓使用者輸入文字。

span.span: Represents a text box in a that allows the user to enter text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已適合裝載於。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 在公開裝載的控制項屬性和事件的子集層級，但基礎控制項是完全可透過存取屬性。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. 控制項可讓使用者在應用程式中輸入文字。The control allows the user to enter text in an application. 這個控制項具有標準 Windows 文字方塊控制項，包括多行編輯中找不到的其他功能。This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing. 一般而言，控制項用來顯示單一文字行，或接受做為輸入。Typically, a control is used to display a single line of text or accept it as input. 您可以使用啟用多行顯示或輸入的文字。You can use the to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered. 設定並屬性，以`true`以允許更多行文字操作控制項。Set the and properties to `true` to allow greater text manipulation in a multiline control. 您可以限制輸入的文字數量藉由設定控制屬性指定的數字的字元。You can limit the amount of text entered into a control by setting the property to a specific number of characters. 使用屬性，以允許使用者輸入，只是大寫、 只有小寫或大寫和小寫字元的組合控制項。Use the property to allow the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the control. 若要限制中所輸入的文字控制項，您可以建立的事件處理常式事件，以驗證輸入控制項中的每個字元。To restrict text from being entered in a control, you can create an event handler for the event in order to validate each character entered in the control. 您也可以限制中的資料的所有項目控制項，藉由設定屬性設`true`。You can also restrict all entry of data in a control by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範各種常見的屬性設定，包括自動完成選項。The following code example demonstrates a with various common property settings, including automatic completion options. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在多行 控制項中按 ENTER 時，是否會在控制項中建立新行文字或啟動表單的預設按鈕。

value.span: 如果 ENTER 鍵在控制項的多行版本中建立新的文字行，則為 ，如果 ENTER 鍵啟動表單的預設按鈕，則為 。

span.span: if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值是`false`，使用者必須按 CTRL + ENTER 鍵來建立新的一行中多行控制項。If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline control. 如果沒有任何預設按鈕的表單，然後 ENTER 鍵會永遠建立新的一行文字在控制項中，無論這個屬性的值為何。If there is no default button for the form, then the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, no matter what the value of this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法通用的屬性設定，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在指定的位置`pt`參數是外部的控制項，第一個字元字串中指定的點最接近的工作區`pt`會傳回。If the location specified in the `pt` parameter is outside the client area of the control, the first character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned. 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪些字元位於接近控制項內的特定位置。You can use this method to determine which characters are located near a specific point within the control. 您接著可以使用此值，在該位置的文字上執行作業。You can then use this value to perform operations on the text at that location. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的位置`pt`參數位於右側的控制項，最後一個字元字串中指定的點最接近的工作區`pt`會傳回。If the specified location in the `pt` parameter is located on the right side of the client area of the control, the last character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回最接近的位置中指定的字元索引`pt`參數。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字元索引是文字的在控制項中，包含空格的以零為起始索引。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 您可以使用這個方法，以判斷其中文字中的使用者將滑鼠移過將滑鼠座標傳遞給這個方法。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 這可以是很有用，如果您想要執行工作，當滑鼠指標停留在控制項文字中的字。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the mouse pointer hovers over a word in the text of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`lineNum`參數是負值，會傳回 0。If the `lineNum` parameter is negative, returns 0. 如果`lineNum`參數超過在控制項中的行數傳回控制項中的最後一行的第一個字元索引。If the `lineNum` parameter exceeds the number of lines in the control, returns the first character index for the last line in the control. 傳回第一個字元索引之實體的線條。 returns the first character index of a physical line. 實際的電話線已顯示的行，而不是指派的行。The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line. 顯示的行數可能會大於使用指派的行，因為自動換行數。The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap. 比方說，如果您指派至兩個長行控制項，並將和到`true`，長時間指派的並列產生四個實體 （或顯示行）。For example, if you assign two long lines to a control and set and to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您判斷中指定的字元索引為基礎的行號`index`方法的參數。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控制項中文字的第一行會傳回值為零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法傳回的實體的行號索引的字元位於控制項。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果第一個邏輯程式敘述行中的文字部分控制項換行至下一行，方法會傳回 1，如果第二個實際的電話線已包裝的指定的字元索引處的字元。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果設為`false`、 沒有部分的行換行至下一步，而方法會傳回 0，指定的字元索引。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪些行特定的字元索引位於內。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在呼叫之後方法來搜尋文字，您可以取得字元索引，要找到搜尋結果。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以呼叫這個方法所傳回的字元索引與找不到方法，以判斷哪一行文字。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的字元索引`index`參數已超出可用的控制項中包含的程式行數目，會傳回最後一個行號。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ScrollToCaret() cil managed

summary.span: 捲動控制項的內容至目前插入號 (Caret) 所在位置。

span.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您捲動控制項的內容，直到插入號位於控制項的可見區域。This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control. 如果插入號位於下方的控制項的可見區域方法會捲動控制項的內容，直到插入號會顯示在控制項底部。If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control. 如果插入號位於上方控制項的可見區域，這個方法會捲動控制項的內容，直到插入號會顯示在控制項的頂端。If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control. 您可以使用這個方法在多行文字方塊中，以確保目前的文字項目點的控制項之可見區域內。You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果控制項沒有焦點，或插入號已放置在控制項的可見區域，這個方法沒有任何作用。This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要設定控制項的文字中的第一個字元的起始位置，設定`start`參數設為 0。If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to 0. 您可以使用這個方法，以選取的文字，例如當子控制項的文字中搜尋和取代的資訊。You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information. > [!NOTE] > 您可以透過程式設計方式將插入號移文字方塊內藉由設定`start`至您想要將插入號移至，並將 [文字] 方塊內的位置參數`length`參數的值為零 (0)。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the `start` parameter to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the `length` parameter to a value of zero (0). 為了讓將插入號移動文字方塊必須取得焦點。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項中不選取任何文字，則這個屬性會指出新文字的插入點。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text. 如果您為控制項中文字的長度超過設定這個屬性，將會在最後一個字元後放選取範圍開始位置。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character. 在文字方塊控制項中選取文字時，變更此屬性可能會減少的值屬性。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the property. 如果所指定的位置之後控制項中的其餘文字屬性是值小於屬性、 值屬性就會自動減少。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 值屬性永遠不會導致增加屬性。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property. > [!NOTE] > 您可以透過程式設計方式將插入號移文字方塊內藉由設定至您想要將插入號移至，並將 [文字] 方塊內的位置屬性設為零 (0) 的值。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 為了讓將插入號移動文字方塊必須取得焦點。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.
